features.title: Enhanced module docstrings for core engine components
features.description: Added comprehensive module-level documentation to 6 core MemDocs modules (mcp_server, extract, embeddings, search, summarize, policy) describing their purpose, capabilities, and architectural role. Clarifies flagship MCP integration, multi-language symbol extraction, zero-cost local embeddings, FAISS-based vector search, Claude-powered summarization, and intelligent scope escalation.

features.title: Dogfooding: Committed .memdocs/ directory for self-documentation
features.description: Modified .gitignore to allow committing .memdocs/ directory, demonstrating MemDocs usage on its own codebase with git-committed memories.
